QuestData.Title: Vengeance for Korthia
QuestData.Description:
While opening the vault is our priority, I must ask a favor.
When Korthia was pulled into the Maw, my people were terrified. We fled to the area you see before you, a place of peace called the Scholar's Den.
The Mawsworn soon descended upon us. Most of my kind were slaughtered. Others were taken captive.
If I could claim vengeance myself, I would. But I... I am ill-equipped for battle. Not like you.
Please. Show these monsters that their defilement of Korthia will not stand!
QuestData.RewardText: Vengeance will not bring back the fallen, but it gives those of us who survived a measure of satisfaction.
